about_the_game:
Play different classes, explore dungeons with AI teammates, defeat enemies and bosses, collect a variety of gear, and build and upgrade your own Home City.

Dungeon Tale is an ARPG game where you can choose your character's race, gender, and class. You'll team up with AI allies and explore different dungeons filled with enemies and powerful bosses like Undead, Orcs, Blood Knights, and Demons. Defeating them lets you collect various gear, from basic to legendary.

The game has a Home City where you can buy items, recruit teammates, and healers. As you progress, you can upgrade your city, unlock better services, and even hire legendary heroes.

For instance, in the Warrior Zone, you can recruit Warriors or Rogues from the castle and purchase armor and weapons from the blacksmith. In the Mage Zone, you can hire healers from the Garden. At the start, your home city is basic, offering essential services. As you level up, you can upgrade your city. This means better buildings, expanded item offerings from merchants, improved AI teammate gear, and the chance to hire legendary heroes.

Dungeon Tale is continuously updated with new classes, dungeons, and buildings like Alchemy Labs and Arenas in the home city. Thanks for your support!

Races:

Human: Increased stunning ability by 20% on attacks.
High Elve: Raised energy limit by 33%.
Barbarian: Reduced rage consumption for super special moves by 10%.

Classes:

Warrior: Equip single-handed weapons and shields, forming defensive combos while switching to a two-handed weapon for massive damage at critical moments.
Rogue: Proficient with dual-wielded melee weapons and a backup bow, switching freely between long-range and close-range combat. Special super move combos allow for assassinations on regular enemies.
Mage: Excel in ranged combat, using lightning, fire, and frost spells to attack enemies in different combo combinations.

Home City System

Players can build and upgrade their homecity. Upgraded homecity will increase magic found, gold and exp gain rate. Increase the equipment of AI Teammate, and unlock Epic and Legendary heroes.
Upgraded blacksmith or tailer house will also provide higher level equipments.
The home city contains 3 major zone.

1. Warrior Zone


Max level 5
Upgrade each level will Increase 25% magic item found, gold and experience gain rate.

Warrior Trainingyard

Max level 5
Hire strength and agility heroes, will lock epic hero at level 4 and legendary hero at level 5
Upgrade each level will Increase 25% magic item found, gold and experience gain rate.

Armor Smith

Max level 5
Provide armors for strength and agility heroes, will lock epic item at level 4 and legendary item at level 5.

Weapon Smith

Max level 5
Provide weapons for all heroes, will lock epic item at level 4 and legendary item at level 5.

2. Mage Zone


Max level 5
Upgrade each level will Increase 25% magic item found, gold and experience gain rate.

Acdemy

Max level 5
Hire intelligence heroes, will lock epic hero at level 4 and legendary hero at level 5.

Garden

Max level 5
Provide healers, upgrade it will increase the heal power and HP of healers.
Upcoming Features: Unlock new healers.

Tailer House

Max level 5
Provide armors intelligence heroes, will lock epic item at level 4 and legendary item at level 5.

3. Market Zone


Max level 5
Upgrade each level will Increase 25% magic item found, gold and experience gain rate.

Upcoming Features: Achemy Lab, Guild Hall and Arena.

name: Dungeon Tale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 290X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 290X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: Play different classes, explore dungeons with AI teammates, defeat enemies and bosses, collect a variety of gear, and build and upgrade your own Home City.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
